page.title: 09TYPICAL DAY by Clare Loughan
page.content: 08.00 Up! Slippers and dressing gown. 08.05 Mummy has breakfast ready- usually Alpen (dried fruit and nuts) ready.After this I have toast,tea, and marmalade (that seems mixed up somehow). Now I go to my room. Sister and I take turns at making beds: my turn to-day.Then- wash; wouldn't you know? Teeth and all that... Back in the kitchen, waken the cat(!) and feed it 09.05 Off to school. Arrive 09.15 play with friends till- BELL- 09.30 Maths and more Maths till break- I like Maths actually, don't let on. 10,50 Potato crisps and drink. Then Mr.L. reads to us...good.. then English,or Science then Religion. I like to ask relly hard questions, like-"What was before eternity? (Cont'd)
